questions.question: Stagnation pressure or the total pressure is the sum of

answers.c: Kinetic energy, potential energy and gravity

questions.question: The relation between pressure and velocity in an inviscid, incompressible flow is given by
Why pressure measurements were taken at the center of the section?
Which of the following  is not an assumption of Bernoulli's theorem?

answers.a: the Static pressure decreases along the direction of fluid motion.
answers.b: the Stagnation pressure decreases along the direction of fluid motion.
answers.c: the Static pressure increases along the direction of fluid motion.
answers.d: the Stagnation pressure increases along the direction of fluid motion.
